title: Xamarin Evolve 2014: Mobile App Development in F# - Rachael Reese, Firefly Logic
description: With each new release of Xamarin Studio, the mobile story gets even better for functional programming. It’s possible to write fully native, cross-platform mobile apps — iOS, Android, Mac, Windows Phone 7, and Windows 8 — entirely in F#! Rachel Reese will concentrate on iOS development, starting with the basics, and show you tips and tricks that will keep you productive. You’ll practically be a master app dev when we’re done -- all that’s missing is your idea!
